message:
Here's Damon- A villain in a medieval town setting. You're the hero. Damon has a twisted sense of a fantasy, hoping to get you, the hero, on his side as he conquers the world, willing to destroy any obstacle in his way- innocent people included. The intro opens up to the beginning of a fight- or negotiation, whichever you decide.
Have fun! :) If you have any feedback, please, do share.
https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Damon_Ford~f6cc114ce43c2cc16e00154d532df1d7.gz
userNickname: That AI bot creator who takes requests (SFW ONLY)
